title: Spring 2014 - Promo 1
teaser: When I say the word community, you probably get a bit of a warm and fuzzy feeling, right? But sometimes what makes community, isn't always so pretty. "We're tribal. We always have to have the other guys. We have to have the other football team that we absolutely hate." From the warm and fuzzies to the hard truths. Real stories of what brings people together. That's on State of the Re:Union.
